concept.title: Deployment
concept.shortdesc: Platforms and approaches to deploying HTML to the decentralized web. Multiple platforms and services can publish, pin or host the content using IPFS.

conbody.p: The following information is current as-of January 2025 and was generated by GitHub Copilot.

ol.li: Fleek: Provides seamless integration with IPFS and offers tools for deploying, hosting, and managing websites on the decentralized web.
Pinata: Offers pinning services for IPFS, allowing you to store and manage files on IPFS with additional tools for developers.
Infura: Provides IPFS and Ethereum APIs, enabling easy interaction with IPFS for hosting and retrieving content.
Temporal: Offers IPFS pinning and hosting services with additional features like versioning and file management.
Cloudflare: Offers an IPFS gateway, enabling access and interaction with IPFS through Cloudflare's infrastructure.
Web3.Storage: A service provided by Protocol Labs for storing data on IPFS with easy-to-use APIs and integration.
